edu.uw.cs.cse461.util

Class ConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • edu.uw.cs.cse461.util.ConfigManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigManagerInterface, Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>

    public class ConfigManager
extends Properties
implements ConfigManagerInterface
    A class intended to make parsing the config.ini file easier. See ConfigManagerInterface for further documentation and a concise list of public methods.
    Author:
    zahorjan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ConfigManager(FileInputStream configFileInputStream)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigManager

        public ConfigManager(FileInputStream configFileInputStream)
              throws IOException
        Can't pass in the more natural config file name because Android won't tell us where it is (won't tell us the path to our assets). Instead, caller must open the file.
        Parameters:
        configFileInputStream - Attached to the config file.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public ArrayList<String[]> readNamePasswordVec(String fieldName)
                                        throws RuntimeException
        Reads entries like jz.cse461.:password
        Specified by:
        readNamePasswordVec in interface ConfigManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        fieldName -
        Returns:
        Null if the field doesn't appear in the config file; an empty vector if it appears but is defined to be null; otherwise, the vector of String tuples
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - Entries must have two components.

      • getAsStringVec

        public String[] getAsStringVec(String key)
        Reads a single config file field whose value is a white space separated list of tokens. (E.g., net.services.)
        Specified by:
        getAsStringVec in interface ConfigManagerInterface
        Returns:
        An array of tokens if the field exists and has a vaule; otherwise null.

      • getAsInt

        public int getAsInt(String key)
             throws NoSuchFieldException
        Returns a field value from the config file as an integer. Throws an exception if it doesn't exist or doesn't represent an integer.
        Specified by:
        getAsInt in interface ConfigManagerInterface
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException

      • getAsInt

        public int getAsInt(String key,
           int defaultVal)
        Returns a field value from the config file as an integer. Returns the default value argument if the field doesn't exist.
        Specified by:
        getAsInt in interface ConfigManagerInterface

      • getAsInt

        public int getAsInt(String key,
           int defaultVal,
           int minimum)
        Returns a field value from the config file as an integer. Returns the default value if the config file field value cannot be converted to an integer. Returns the minimum value if the value that otherwise would be returned is less than the minimum.
        Specified by:
        getAsInt in interface ConfigManagerInterface

      • getAsInt

        public int getAsInt(String key,
           int defaultVal,
           int minimum,
           int maximum)
        Returns a field value from the config file as an integer. Returns the default value if the config file field value cannot be converted to an integer. Returns the minimum value if the value that otherwise would be returned is less than the minimum. Returns the maximum value if the value that otherwise would be returned is greater than the maximum.
        Specified by:
        getAsInt in interface ConfigManagerInterface
